updateItemQuantity(Item, int) - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Order

updateItemTotal() - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.OrderItem
Updates the total of the items ordered, this is the Price of the item multiplied by the quantity of the item requested
UpdatePopupMenu - Class in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui
 
UpdatePopupMenu(Manager) - Constructor for class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.UpdatePopupMenu
Constucts a popup menu for when the user right clicks on the JList in the NewOrder, allowing the user to Update the quantity of an item and to remove it from the order
updateSubTotal() - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Order
Runs throught the ArrayList and gets the OrderItemTotal for each OrderItem, this method is run everytime an item is added to the arraylist to ensure that the subtotal is constantly updated when items are added, updated, or removed from the arraylist
updateTable(Order) - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.NewOrder
Updates the table when an item is added, updated or removed
